body: You know those ton of troller is breaking rank game at this time? Some troller chatted in game that they dont care, the cant be banned anyway because none punish them without tributal. replies.body:
Hiya **Cpt Americano**,

Unfortunately, the Tribunal is still in extended recess, and there have been no updates to when the new Tribunal will be rolled out. 

>In the meantime, a new system will hand out restricted chat punishments and game bans rapidly so players will be banned or placed into restricted chat mode within a few hours of their negative behavior. Improvements to another system, LeaverBuster, will tune and upgrade its ability to further address ranked play, ensuring aggressive and severe consequences to maintain the competitive, sportsmanlike spirit of the mode.

Source: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/upgrading-tribunal

The new Tribunal is still a work in progress and Riot is making progress on the system. I don't know much more about the Tribunal changes than the information provided above. Sorry for any inconvenience.
you don't know how many game i fail with afk in my team. they keep doing that and no punish, riot is sucking our money and doing shit

I've had my fair share of players who end up leaving/AFKing games too; however, in comparison to the player punishment systems in the past, the current systems are much more responsive, in terms of leaving games. When I look at a player's profile who disconnects/quits, I ultimately don't see a series of gray bars that say "Leave", but rather see blues and reds. Leaverbuster restricts players who leave on a regular basis, and as it is a relatively automated system, the efficiency of the system is much better than the Tribunal's.
